snippet: Those who know Stewart say he is getting back to his old, playful self after a struggle to recover from a broken leg and a crash in which he struck and killed a young driver at a dirt-track race.
abstract: Nascar driver Tony Stewart tells reporters at Daytona International Speedway that he is ready to put the past two years of struggle behind him and is preparing to return to Sprint Cup racing.
lead_paragraph: Those who know Stewart say he is getting back to his old, playful self after a struggle to recover from a broken leg and a crash in which he struck and killed a young driver at a dirt-track race.

headline.main: His Eyes Fixed Straight Ahead, Tony Stewart Plans Resurgence After Two Trying Years
headline.print_headline: His Eyes Fixed Straight Ahead, Stewart Plans Resurgence After Two Trying Years

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
